text: Ufology is the search for and research of unidentified flying objects by people who called ufologists. The term was coined by Edward J. Ruppelt.Ruppelt, Edward (2007). The Report On Unidentified Flying Objects. Charleston, South Carolina: BiblioBazaar. Mainstream scientists have greeted this topic with skepticism, dismissing ufology as pseudoscience. == Related page == *List of ufologists == References == Category:UFOs Category:Pseudoscience
title: Ufology
